I ordered the exact same pants a few months back and again a week ago because I like it so much and it fit me so well. I'm 6'4" 189lbs and previously ordered XL with great fit and finish.  When I ordered the pants again with same size XL, the label in the pants showed XL, however the new pants was 4 to 6 inches longer than the previous order and much wider in the waist, as well as differences in the quality of the seams.  This is a legitimate product review that shows inconsistencies in the quality of the product. If I order the same product again, I expect to receive the same product but in this case the fit and finish is completely different, even though the sizing label in the pants is the same.  I hope Amazon will not reject my review again based on a factual observation in regards to product quality. Customers have a right to know about possible issues with the product, that is why the review system exists.

评论概述: Why is the draw strong so long?
评论详情: The fabric is somewhat thin. If you hold them up to the light you can see through. It's not terrible, but thinner than I expected.  Also the pockets go down almost to my knees and the pocket fabric is kind of bulky and you can see the fabric bunch where the pockets are. I will probably cut off 1/2 the depth of the pocket and sew it so the pockets don't bunch up.  Why the heck is the drawn string so long it hangs down to the knees?? Is that trendy or something? It looks stupid. I could literally wrap it around me twice! I will probably take out the draw strong or replace it, because it's ridiculous.  Other than the pockets and the drawstring, they are a cute fit and comfy.
